name: Crimson Jelly
movement: can fly 60 ft. (hover) and swim 30 ft.
description: The Crimson Jelly is a tiny, translucent ooze, faintly glowing crimson in darkness, capable of squeezing through tight spaces with ease.
memorable: Its ability to become invisible in light and attach to foes for suffocation makes it a unique and tactical combatant.
goals: To drain opponents and control the battlefield by seizing opportunities in chaotic encounters.
relations: Often encountered alongside other oozes or as a solitary predator in dark, moist environments.
environment: Predominantly found in damp areas, caves, or near water sources.
strengths: Immunity to exhaustion and several debilitating conditions enhances its resilience in combat.
weaknesses: Low physical strength and constitution make it vulnerable to high-damage attacks.
attacks: Uses 'Feeding Paddles' to deal necrotic damage and gains temporary hit points, potentially suffocating its target.
most_powerful_ability: The 'Tainted Attacks' ability can impose exhaustion on foes, leading to memory loss and nightmares.
senses: Possesses keen senses within a 10-foot radius, making it difficult to detect due to its stealth score.
skills: Has a high stealth score of 14, allowing effective ambush tactics.
additional_information: Can split into smaller jelly types with the Reproduce ability.
Invisible in dim or bright light, creating tactical advantages.
Utilizes blood sense to track living creatures efficiently.
Immune to several conditions, enhancing its combat survivability.
Can pass through narrow spaces without penalties due to its amorphous form.
test_queries: ooze with necrotic attacks and blood sense
crimson jelly that splits into new jellies
suffocating jelly monster in dark caves
